name: runtipi
description: Runtipi is a self-hosted app manager designed for homelabs. It allows users to deploy lightweight services with single commands and manage updates through a web UI.
features: One-click deployment: Install popular self-hosted apps with a single command.
App marketplace: Browse and deploy from a curated catalog of homelab applications.
Update management: Keep installed apps up to date with automatic or manual updates.
Web dashboard: Manage all your apps through a centralized browser interface.
Docker-based: Run apps in isolated containers for security and easy management.
Configuration UI: Adjust app settings without editing configuration files.
Backup support: Create and restore backups of app data and configurations.
Resource monitoring: View CPU, memory, and storage usage for each app.
Port management: Automatically handle port assignments to avoid conflicts.
SSL certificates: Generate and manage HTTPS certificates for secure access.
User authentication: Protect your dashboard with password or SSO login.
Lightweight design: Run efficiently on Raspberry Pi and other low-power hardware.
